head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths RACHLIN, LUCILLE SHYEV

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths RACHLIN, LUCILLE SHYEV

block.p: RACHLIN-Lucille Shyev. On October 14, 2000, age 96. Beloved wife of the late H.L. Rachlin, M.D., a longtime member of the New York Psychoanalytic Society. Smith College alumna, class of 1925. Attended University of Chicago, took an MSS at Smith, law degree at NYU. Worked for the N.Y. Police Department and the Jewish Board of Guardians. Survived by cousins Ovid Rose and Ray Morrison, nephew Richard Ullman, niece Beverly S. Goldberg.

Survived by cousins Ovid Rose and Ray Morrison, nephew Richard Ullman, niece Beverly S. Goldberg.
